channel.title: Yelp on Gershom Tripp
channel.description: Recent content in Yelp on Gershom Tripp

item.title: Characterizing Berlin's Districts Through Yelp Data
item.description:
Introduction Note that I frequently use the term district in place of neighborhood.
Getting the Data The data were collected using the official Yelp Fusion API. Yelp’s API isn’t really made for bulk downloading data, so there were three limits to contend with: 1. max 50 listings per request, 2. max 1000 listings per query (50 listing-chunks x 20 offsets), and 3. max 5000 requests per day. Using district names and PLZ (German ZIP codes) consistently failed because of 2.
